metadata.title: CVE-2021-22167 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from12.1. Incorrect headers in specific project page allows attacker to have atemporary read access to the private repository

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
